help: -Link names and tags may contain spaces, and are NOT case sensitive
!addlink https://link, link name, first tag, second tag

errors.badlink: Only links beginning with http or https allowed!
errors.noedit: Only OP can overwrite their own links!
missingarg: You must provide a link, name, and at least 1 tag.
Separate arguments by a comma followed by a space: `arg1, arg2`

help: -Link names may contain spaces and are NOT case sensitive
tags: search tags,will show here,separated by commas

errors.notfound: No link with that name. Use !findlinks or !filterlinks to search.
errors.noinput: Please enter the name of the link to get

help: -Link names may contain spaces and are NOT case sensitive
-This command cannot be undone, and takes effect immediately

errors.notfound: No link with that name in database.
errors.noinput: Please enter the name of the link to delete.

help: -This command cannot be undone, and takes effect immediately

errors.nolinks: There are no links to delete.

help: -Find will return any links whose names or tags contain any of the keyword terms
-Keyword terms may have spaces, but this will limit your search
`!find-links` or `!find-link` or `!find-l` may be used optionally to specify a search for links
`!find-tags` or `!find-tag` or `!find-t` may be used to optionally specify a search for tags
*Note: If no keywords are entered in !find-tags, Find will return all tags from all links*

errors.notfound: No results. Make sure to separate each keyword with a comma to expand search.
